extendedInfo.description: The definite app for following Australian and World news!Forget what you know about news consumption and meet the new approach for consuming news & videos: no more duplicated news stories, no more hard work for pinpointing the most prominent stories and no more hard work creating your personal news edition !In Riversip Australian News, you'll always find a fresh, top selection of the most significant news articles & videos of Australia and any of its states.Powered by the highly-acclaimed Riversip engine, this app's main goal is simple: Help you catch up on the news in minimal time and on your own schedule.In less than a minute, you can be on top of the latest âmust-knowâ items: This is the app where you stop by to have a quick glimpse at the most important news stories of the day, the week, or the hour. So, what exactly do you get in Riversip Australian News? * No setup or learning time required. Fire the app for the first time â and immediately see what are the current âmust-knowâ news - from all major news outlets !* Catch up on your own schedule: You can choose your own time-frame in one tap, so you'll be up-to-date no matter how often you're checking things out. * Videos curated from leading news sources* Check out only the headlines â or go deeper: You can check out any news item's coverage from the many sources which covered it. Seeing how different publications cover the same event from different angles was never so easy !* See what people you follow on Twitter had to say about any given story and have their tweets affect which stories you see first, giving you a socially-personalized news summary * No need to set up your sources and start looking for feeds! The app automatically picks the most relevant article for any real-world event and shows it to you â and it also learns what sources you prefer as you use the app, and shows coverage from them to you when it's available. * Choose your favorite topics so you can easily stay on top of the things in the topics that matter to you. If there's a specific region, news section, politician, topic or anything else you'd like to follow, this is the easiest, most efficient way to do so!* Notifications about notable events are sent to you as they occur! Never lose a key update again. (and if you prefer not to bothered, you can turn them off :) )The app features content from leading online news & video sources, including ABC News, Sky News, Yahoo, Perth Now (and more) and covers news from all states: New South Wales, Queensland, South Australia, Tasmania, Victoria and Western Australia.From user reviews of other Riversip-powered apps:"Perfect news app" - Bernhard (5 stars)"Wow. One of the best news apps out there!" - Ferdy (5 stars)"Excellent! I really like this!" (5 stars)Follow and chat with us at: http://twitter.com/riversip Use of the Riversip Application is governed by the Riversip Terms of Use (http://www.riversip.com/terms).

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I just use this for catching up as I have a baby girl who keeping me busy enough that I don\'t get to watch tv anymore.  Atleast it keeps me in touch on What\'s happening out there. Awesome app! Thanks guys!
reviews.author: Colin Lim

reviews.title: Perfect, short of doing the dishes
reviews.comment: Absolutely great app. Best way to get news from home.
reviews.author: Daniel Masmanian

reviews.title: Needs UI overhaul
reviews.comment: Perfect app but needs a sleeker UI and icon in line with Hilo guidelines. Just feels clunky at the moment. Brilliantly functioning app though. Look forward to a new UI! ;)
reviews.author: Michael McCulloch

reviews.title: Good news source
reviews.comment: Loads quick Has heaps of info
reviews.author: Andy shad

reviews.title: Great News App.
reviews.comment: It does what I want with a minimum of fuss. I\'d recommend it to anyone looking for a useful News App.
reviews.author: Ross Niebling

reviews.title: The only Australia News app you need
reviews.comment: Absolutely top app. Developer is very responsive and seems eager to keep improving the app. A must have!
reviews.author: Peter Smith

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to toggle between different countries to see the news from their perspective.   The video news is really good quality. Might be handy if the videos were broken into the different categories for ease of use.   Its the best news app on android.
reviews.author: Christopher Simpson

reviews.comment: good app, will be 5 if it is faster in start up and go to full stories.
reviews.author: Freeman LIU

reviews.title: easy to use, loads stories quickly
reviews.author: buggrit phooey

reviews.title: Limited and slow
reviews.comment: Poor and limited coverage of topics. Looks pretty but not meaty enough.
reviews.author: Alida Bonotto

reviews.title: Just installed
reviews.comment: Looks promising. A widget would be good though.
reviews.author: A Google User
